Judul: OPTIMIZING MARKET PREFERENCES FOR PROPERTY BUSINESS BY APPLYING FINANCIAL & MARKET ANALYSIS
Abstrak:
This paper addresses the issue of factor affecting for market preferences in choosing residential 

product in Bandung city. This study also analyse the reason behind the price allocation for 

residential product. Using a designed questionnaire, response from housing consumer in 2017 were 

used to determine current housing market in Bandung city. The result suggested unique preferences 

for each type of development and to confirm the current property market conditions in Bandung. 

The condition also applies for most demographics attributes such as age, gender, education, 

income, and variety of factors. 

And also the feasibility study will be using discounted cashflow and the method will use Net 

Present Value (NPV), Internal Rate of Return (IRR), Payback Period for the comparison in each 

option. 

The result shown that option 3 is the best choice in this location. Option 3 is a high-rise 

development that have 3 towers and consist of 1.536 units. These option give NPV IDR 126,263.33 

million, IRR 53.84% and PBP 1.41 year. These results also supported by the questionnaire result 

that the society prefer high-rise than landed property in this location.
Kata Kunci: Bandung city, Market preferences, Property market condition, Residential product, Unique preferences
